## AsyncRetryConsumer.eachMessage() method

Wraps the provided handler with a handler that will send the message to the appropriate retry (or dead-letter) topic if an exception is thrown

**Signature:**

```typescript
eachMessage(handler: TAsyncRetryConsumerMessageHandler): EachMessageHandler;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handler

</td><td>

[TAsyncRetryConsumerMessageHandler](./kafka-uroboros.tasyncretryconsumermessagehandler.md)

</td><td>

your message handler that will be provided with a few extra parameters relevant to the async retry process

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

EachMessageHandler

- a standard message handler that can be passed to a KafkaJS consumer instance
